```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, dplyr, tidyverse, tmap)
```

Importing shopping mall csv data

```{r}
shopping_mall <- read_csv("shopping_mall_coordinates.csv")
```

Converting into sf dataframe

```{r}
mall_sf <- st_as_sf(shopping_mall,
                    coords = c("LONGITUDE", 
                               "LATITUDE"),
                    crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414)

st_crs(mall_sf)
```


Writing to RDS

```{r}
write_rds(mall_sf, "mall_sf")
```

```{r}
tm_shape(mpsz_sf) +
  tm_polygons() +
  tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE)+
  tm_shape(mall_sf) +
  tm_dots()
```
